title: Markets, Healthcare, And Politics Ahead Of Jobs Day
itunes:title: Markets, Healthcare, And Politics Ahead Of Jobs Day
description:
Pete Earle, economist for the American Institute for Economic Research, discusses inflation, the Federal Reserve, and economic outlook for the rest of 2021. Janet Elkin, President and CEO of ICON Medical Network, discusses healthcare expectations for jobs day. CEO and President of the Association for Corporate Growth Tom Bohn talking about M&A and markets. Bloomberg Washington correspondent and host of "Sound On" Joe Mathieu discusses Democratic strategy following Tuesday's governor races. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
